questions.question_text: Which two actions can be selected with the Bulk Administration Tool in Cisco Unity Connection? (Choose two.)
An end user is unable to sign into Jabber. Assuming that network connectivity has been verified, which two settings for the end user should be checked? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
A. Jabber Advanced Settings
B. Cisco Unified Communications Manager Service Profile

choices.E: Cisco Unified Presence Server System Topology AB
choices.B: Cisco Unified Communications Manager Service Profile
choices.D: Cisco Unified Presence Server Application Listener
choices.C: Cisco Unified Presence Server Advanced Settings

questions.question_text: Which two options allow the maximum message length to be adjusted in Cisco Unity Connection? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
A. Message Settings under individual users
B. User Templates > VoiceMailUserTemplate > Message Settings

choices.C: The LDAP configuration in Cisco Unified Communications Manager must have the Cisco Unity Connections LDAP integration in Cisco Unified CM Administration option enabled.
choices.A: The Cisco Unity Connections Primary server must be restarted.
choices.E: The LDAP Directory Configuration must be completed in the Cisco Unity Connection Administration interface.
choices.D: The Cisco Unity Connections HA server must be restarted.
choices.F: The LDAP authentication settings are incorrectly specified in Cisco Unity Connections.

comments.content: I think even if the authentication settings are incorrectly, you can still chose import from LDAP. It just fails.

questions.question_text:
An IT administrator integrated the Cisco Unified Communications Manager cluster with the corporate Active Directory server using the Lightweight Directory
Access Protocol. However, after accessing the Cisco Unity Connection Administration section of the CUC cluster web interface, the IT administrator cannot access LDAP Directory from Users> Import Users. Which two problems have occurred? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
A. Cisco Unified Communication Manager
C. Cisco Unity Connection

choices.E: Cisco Unified Contact Center Enterprise AC

questions.question_text: Which options are two on-premise components of Cisco IM & Presence? (Choose two.)
